full_summary:
### G9292-241132: PeopleSoft Functional Resources at ESDC
#### Reference Number: WS4442141195 and Document Number: 4452265552
The Department of Employment and Social Development (ESDC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) to select a contractor to provide PeopleSoft Functional Resources. 

#### Amendment Notice
This RFP document is modified with seven (7) amendments.

#### RFP Documents
A web-based notice and any accompanying documents or specified attachments may be accessed on the Ariba Discovery portal using the following link:
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18851437?extsite=MTg4NTE0MzdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### Background
ESDC requires resources in various roles to enhance, operate, and maintain the Oracle Human Capital Management (HCM) PeopleSoft solution on an as-needed basis. This requirement is directed towards addressing specific skills gaps in their organization.

#### Tender Notice
This is an expired tender, the tender closing date was 3 April 2024, 14:00 local time. The planned contract start date is 11 July 2024, with no fixed contract end date.

#### Requirements
Contractors must demonstrate expertise in PeopleSoft Functional Resources with the ESDC teams. The role involves the enhancement, operation, and maintenance of the Oracle Human Capital Management (HCM) PeopleSoft solution.

#### Trade Agreements
This RFP may be eligible under the Canada-Peru  Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and others.

#### Evaluation Criteria
The evaluation will consider a combination of technical merit and price. The award will be based upon the highest combined rating for technical merit and price.

#### Contact Information
For any inquiries, please contact:
Sebastien Dupuis
Department of Public Works and Government Services
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
Phone: None
Email: sebastien.dupuis@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Note: These details may or may not reflect current information as this tender is now expired. The bidder should contact the relevant contact information listed above for any inquiries.
